text: Giovanni Cianfriglia (5 April 1935 â€“ 30 October 2024), also known as Ken Wood, was an Italian actor and stuntman. He appeared in more than 100 movies from 1958 to 2000. He was known for his roles in Spaghetti Westerns. He was born in Anzio, Italy. Cianfriglia died on 30 October 2024 in Anzio at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Stunt performers Category:Actors from Lazio
title: John Cianfriglia
